actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to provide for the striking of medals in commemoration of the 500th anniversary of the birth of Nicolaus Copernicus (Mikolaj Kopernik).

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Treasury to provide for the striking of medals in commemoration of the five hundredth anniversary of the birth of Nicolaus Copernicus (Mikolaj Kopernik) in recognition of his great contribution to astronomy and the advancement of science.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the striking of medals in commemoration of the 500th anniversary of the birth of Nicolaus Copernicus (Mikolaj Kopernik).
